text.textblock: Vital and Health Statistics National Committee; Meetings
Change of Time, Date, and Place for the National Committee on Vital and Health Statistics (NCVHS) Subcommittee on Mental Health Statistics: Meeting.

usdept.textblock: DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES

usbureau.textblock: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

date.textblock: Room 703A-729A, Hubert H. Humphrey Building, 200 Independence Avenue, SW., Washington, DC 20201.

summary.textblock: Notice is given that the meeting for the NCVHS Subcommittee on Mental Health Statistics has been rescheduled due to inclement weather. The meeting purpose announced in the original notice remains unchanged.

Substantive program information as well as summaries of the meeting and a roster of committee members may be obtained from Gail F. Fisher, Ph.D., Executive Secretary, NCVHS, National Center for Health Statistics, Room 1100, Presidential Building, 6525 Belcrest Road, Hyattsville, Maryland 20782, telephone number 301/436-7050.

signjob.textblock: Associate Director for Policy Coordination, Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC).
